ygData.subject: RE: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: b/c CLurg has his own faction, he s in the ogre city and you need to give him a book you get in Freeport that is no drop.  therefore only enchanters can (with
ygData.messageBody:
b/c CLurg has his own faction, he's in the ogre city and you need to give
him a book you get in Freeport that is no drop. therefore only enchanters
can (with spells) get high enought faction. There was one ogre warrior that
I know of that did this quest (the first PC to do it FYI), but he has since
stopped running the quest for ppl.

high level is when you get one spell of there's...it's some faction spell.

Omeg


>Why do you have to be a high level enchanter?
>What level IS high? :)
